title: After Helping Out
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>You really helped me out for being here today~.... Thank you, Nico-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Nico is already exhausted though…. What kind of diving shop deals with that many kids regularly!? This is not a daycare, you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah~, today was just one of those days…. If it’s one or two, I can usually deal them<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Well, aren’t you glad that Nico is the one here. If it was anyone else, I think it would’ve been impossible<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah, truly~. I’m not really used to it, so I’m worried if I’ve handled it the right way or not<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>For someone who’s not used to it, you did a pretty good job, no? Every single one of those kids were smiling. I say it was a big success<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Fufu, thank you, Nico-chan. Alright, I made you wait, but shall we go diving now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Yay! It’s my first time, so make sure to teach me properly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course, as proper as they get! I’ll also take you to the prettiest diving point that I recommend!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>Really!? I brought an underwater camera, so take a photo of the cutest underwater Nico, okay♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Uhh, we’ll be wearing snorkeling masks, so making it cute is…. Something I can’t guarantee….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
